data.title: Different then in the city
data.text: i have no complaints about garden china good flavor just everything was made differently then the city restaurants

data.title: A pleasant suprise
data.text: I would have never checked out this place because it's in a crowded shopping area near Wal-Mart. But what a nice delight. Smoothie was good. Only one or two tables to eat at so better for carry-out!

data.title: Very Tasty, Don't Miss Out
data.text: Small place take out! But very good taste on the Chicken fried Rice.  Egg drop soup they put it in a good size container. There are 2 tables so not really a place for dining. Orange Chicken had a great flavor. I would come back again.

data.title: Best Chinese in the Western Suburbs!
data.text:
It is basically a Chinese takeout restaurant (only has 2 tables) in a Walmart strip mall, but needs to be featured on DIner's, Drive-In's and Dive's...My judgement of a great Chinese restaurant is based upon 2 distinct things, as I always order the same things - Wonton Soup and Combination Lo Mein - I have been searching the Bolingbrook, Woodridge, Downer's Grove and Naperville area for the past 3 years for some decent Chinese food with no luck - I am very thankful I gave this place a shot!

Wonton Soup - very good, but basic - really wish they had Wor Wonton! My absolute favorite!

House Special Lo Mein - Excellent! Wouldn't change anything!

The last time I was in I wanted to try their BBQ Ribs - 5 ribs for like $5.95 - Huge Flavorful Ribs, not dinky little ones you sometimes get - and they were awesome!

For all 3 items my bill was under $15 and fed me for 2 days!!!

I've been their twice now in the past month and both times the food has been excellent - and what a Great Value! Can't wait to go back!
